name: Sap Master
text: You knock the sense out of foes with a well-timed surprise attack.
benefit: Whenever you use a bludgeoning weapon to deal nonlethal sneak attack damage to a flat-footed opponent, roll your sneak attack dice twice, totaling the results as your nonlethal sneak attack damage for that attack.
staminaText: You can spend 10 stamina points to use this feat on one attack against an opponent you are flanking, instead of one that is flat-footed.
text_zh: 你在最恰当的时点敲中对手的七寸。
benefit_zh: 当你使用钝击武器、对一个措手不及的对象造成非致命伤害的偷袭时，将所有偷袭d6双骰合计作为非致命偷袭伤害。
staminaText_zh: 你可以消耗10点耐力来在一次针对你所夹击敌人的攻击上应用这个专长，而不是针对一个措手不及的敌人。
